Title: Wag the Dog
Writer: Larry Beinhart (book), Hilary Henkin (screenplay), David Mamet (screenplay)
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Robert De Niro, Anne Heche, Woody Harrelson
Plot: After being caught in a scandalous situation days before the election, the president does not seem to have much of a chance of being re-elected. One of his advisers contacts a top Hollywood producer in order to manufacture a war in Albania that the president can heroically end, all through mass media.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 21 nominations.
Production: Punch Productions, New Line Cinema, Baltimore Pictures, Tribeca Productions
